Package br.com.mpro3.MproEntity

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomSQLiteOpenHelper
    A helper class to manage database creation and version management.
    DataStore
    Exposes methods to manage entities in database.
    DBManager
    Exposes methods to execute sql commands in SQLite database.
    ObjectInfo
    Class that stores information retrieved through reflection by DataStore
    Query<T>
    Class that builds queries.
    SQLBuilder
    Utility class for build of sql commands based on the entity reflection information and Query calls
    Value
    Utility class overloaded methods with different values types for use with reflection by setting a value type that corresponds to the type of field in Entity noted class.
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    MproEntityError
    Custom error class to differentiate java errors from MproEntities errors
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Entity
    Note classes with @Entity for define class as a data entity mapped in database
    Id
    In one Entity noted class is required one integer field with @Id annotation for map the identifier primary key auto generated by SQLite
    Reference
    In one Entity noted class, note with @Reference the ArrayList collection field of referenced entities of Entity
    Transient
    In one Entity noted class, note with @Transient one field it should not be mapped to the database table.
